default.description: Default map setting. Mollweide projection centered on Greenwich meridian.

cyl_world.description: Cylindrical equidistant world map projection, centered on Greenwich meridian.

mill_world.description: Miller cylindrical world map projection, centered on Greenwich meridian.

mill_eu.description: Miller cylindrical world map projection, with a bounding box centered on Europe.

cyl_eu.description: Cylindrical equidistant world map projection, with a bounding box centered on Europe.
